#text='' `` Baking A Cake '' '' Grandma June was making a cake for uncle Max 's Birthday .
#text=She was excited because , Grandma June agreed to let her help .
#text=They both washed their hands Grandma June said that is always the first step you take when cooking so you do n't spread germs .
#text=Then Grandma June picked two shiny round cake pans .
#text=She let Julia grease the whole inside of each pan with Shortening and then Grandma June dusted each pan lightly with flour .
#text=This is so the cooked cakes would not stick .
#text=Grandma June turned the oven on to heat up to 350 degrees then she placed two bowl onto the counter one was for dry things such as flour , sugar , baking powder and salt .
#text=Grandma June carefully measured each one and let Julia pour them in .
#text=Then she mixed all the dry stuff really well .
#text=Julia 's Grandma June told her to mix well but carefully so the ingredients would not spill because baking is an exact science and the measurements had to be correct .
#text=In the next bowl they measured all the wet things .
#text=In went butter , milk , vanilla and eggs .
#text=Grandma June mixed them very smooth with a hand mixer .
#text=Next they slowly added the wet ingredients to the dry a bit at a time mixing them well into a smooth batter .
#text=The batter get divided evenly between the two cake pans and placed in the hot oven to bake .
#text=After thirty minutes Grandma June poked each cake with a toothpick and it came out with no cake on it .
#text=Grandma June carefully flipped the cakes over onto a cooling rack leave the cake there with no pan on it to cool .
#text=Julia waited for what seemed like a very long time until Grandma June said they were cool .
#text=She brought out her cake stand and placed one cake on it .
#text=Julia watched as Grandma June frosted the layer lightly then placed the other cake on top .
#text=She made quick work of frosting both layers of stacked cakes with smooth fluffy white frosting .
#text=She placed the bid number four and five shaped candles next to each other on the cake .
#text=Julia thought making a cake was lots of work but fun as well .
#text=Especially when she did it with her grandma .
